blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Hot For Teacher
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OWITkn

by DiaryofaMadTheaterMajor

Bucky enrolled in 19th Century English Literature thinking that it’s going to be a literal hell on earth. But he’s pleasantly surprised to discover that not only is Professor Steve Rogers a Grade-A dork but also gorgeous as hell. Bucky begins to develop a crush on his professor and can only hope that the feelings are mutual.

Words: 2170, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Tony Stark, Sam Wilson (Marvel)
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers
  • Additional Tags: professor steve, Student Bucky, Alternate Universe - Student/Teacher, Alternate Universe - College/University


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OWITkn

title: Steve/Tony Ults Recs 2018
body:
It’s Ults day! To celebrate the happiest day of the year, here are recs for lots of great Ults fics published this year. For even more Ults goodness, check out this list of Ults recs from last year. Wishing everybody a happy 16/10 :D


Fluff:

The word I use to describe by nanasekei

“Here,” Steve says, in guise of explanation. Tony’s expression is puzzled. He takes his head off Steve’s shoulder, straightening his posture.
“Is that for me?”
“Yeah,” Steve breathes. His stomach is clenching in anxiety, which is ridiculous – it’s just a fucking ugly scarf, Tony knows so many people, he’s got to have gotten worse gifts before. “It’s, uh. A bit late.”

My Heart Would Benefit From a Little Tenderness From Time to Time  by SuperstringSymphony

“Come with me.” Tony licks his lips, blue eyes lifting to meet Steve’s. “We’ve both had a long week, I thought you might like to relax.” Tony’s gaze darts from side to side.  Steve has noticed since they started this that Tony only ever truly looks nervous when he’s talking to him. “The car is around the front, what do you say, weekend getaway?” Tony smiles, stroking a hand down his back with a featherlight touch. Steve just barely represses a shiver, eyeing Tony for a moment. With other people he’s always a little shuttered. Here though, with Steve, his expression is unguarded, eyes bright with hope. He looks a little strained though, as if the week has taken its toll on him as well.

In Trouble Deep by FestiveFerret, SirSapling @festiveferret @sirsapling

“Whoever did this has a reason, and Stark needs to be with someone who can protect him. He won’t exactly be able to protect himself like this.” Fury looked at the baby consideringly. “No, it’s you, Steve. Besides, he likes you. Suck it up, soldier, you’re stuck with him.”

How To Keep Your Capwolf Happy by laireshi @laireshi

“How was I supposed to know it’d happen? The virus seemed to be completely out of your body. But don’t worry, Cap, you make a dashing werewolf.”
Steve growled.
“You’re not proving me wrong, darling.”

Fake It by laireshi

“Is it true you and Captain America are dating?” the journalist asked.
Tony gave her his most charming smile. “Captain America likes to keep his life private,” he said. “But he knew who I was when he kissed me.” Another fake, wide smile. “We’re very happy.”

Like Sands Through the Hourglass by BlossomsintheMist @blossomsinthemist

It’s a hard mission for the Ultimates.  Luckily, neither Steve nor Tony are as alone as they used to be.


Angst:

Fool’s Luck by msermesth @msermesth

Steve arrives on his doorstep exactly three hours and twenty-seven minutes after Tony finishes the last word of his eulogy.

A Uniform Velocity from the Cradle to the Grave by  Sineala @sineala

The machine found in the wake of the attempted Chitauri invasion opens a portal that could lead anywhere. Steve’s sure as hell not expecting it to lead a decade in the future, to a New York reeling from another alien attack. And he’s definitely not expecting the man he finds on the other side of it.

A Hundred Times, Once by FestiveFerret, SirSapling

The shrill tone of his SHIELD beeper pulls Steve out of sleep and into battle. He fights robots, he fights Tony’s shameless advances, he fights the exhaustion that threatens to take over him, drown him.  And then the next morning, he wakes and does it again. Exactly the same.
And again.
And again.
And again.

Stronger Together by Neverever

Steve has to fight on new battlegrounds to save Tony when Tony is terribly injured in a fight and it’s revealed that they’re secretly married.

Every Chance We’ll Have by magicasen

A mission gone south leaves a city block decimated and Iron Man hospitalized, but what makes top headlines is the fact that Captain America has a secret lover.

To the man himself, it’s a living nightmare. His husband is in a coma, his entire world is falling apart around him, and Steve has to to confront realities he never wanted to.


Smut:

Taking the Edge Off  by CapnShellhead  @capn-shellhead

Cap was a strange one. Every month, for three days, he would head off to some remote location in the woods. So, of course Tony decides to follow him.

Out of Touch by mitochondrials                

Tony is suffering the aftereffects of some AIM engineered breeding chemical. Steve, despite his embarrassment, firmly advocates helping.

Euperipatoides maxiphallus by Anonymous

Steve gets into a sticky situation. With bugs.

two bottle whiskey for the way by  enkiduu

Steve lets Tony fuck him, but it was only supposed to be the once. It was only supposed to be that much.

Come On Mess Me Up by cptxrogers

Being president isn’t easy, especially when you’ve got a civil war to deal with and your staff keeps sending you to PR events. Steve’s had just about enough of the office, the deferential staffers, and the stuffy shirts that Carol makes him wear.
What he really wants is for someone to come along and make a mess of him.

You Don’t Know What Thirst Is by FestiveFerret         

"I need…” Steve stumbled forward again. “Help me. Please.” He took one last step, and his legs gave out. He fell to his knees, chin tipped down, chest heaving. His whole body trembled.

Relax, Darling by cptxrogers

Being president isn’t easy, especially when you’ve got a civil war to deal with and your staff keeps sending you to PR events. Steve’s had just about enough of the office, the deferential staffers, and the stuffy shirts that Carol makes him wear.
What he really wants is for someone to come along and make a mess of him.

An Educational Experience (The Good Things Come To Those Who Wait Remix) by cptxrogers

Ults Tony has a nice day. aka Tony talks Steve through sucking his cock.


Multiverse:

Reflections by laireshi (Ults & 616)

“I am you,” Tony just said.
“You’re certainly pretty enough for it,” the other him said. He made a show of looking around. “Is Captain America here, as well?”

Ulterior Motives by Sineala (Ults & Planet Hulk)

Captured in combat and sold to Arcade, Steve is one of the few survivors of a long-forgotten domain of Battleworld. With Bucky and Devil Dinosaur at his side, Steve fights in the Killiseum by day – and his body is on offer for the richest of the Killiseum’s patrons by night. One evening, he’s given to a man by the name of Antonio Stark, who has a whole lot of feelings for someone who isn’t exactly him, and together they work out an understanding.

A Thousand Kisses Deep by laireshi (Ults & 616)

Steve doesn’t seem too happy when Steve Rogers of Marvel Ultimate gets transported into their universe. He seems even less happy when Tony and the new Steve get closer to each other.

hell is round the corner & hell is around the corner (remix) by CapnShellhead (Ults & MCU)

Steve stumbles across an unlikely sight in the kitchen.

Just for the Conversation by msermesth (Ults & 616) 

Tony’s fine. He’s back on the Avengers, Steve seems to have forgiven him, and he’s building Resilient to change the world.
Then why is he so jealous of Steve’s new boyfriend?
(Or: that awkward moment when you realize you are in love with your old best friend while having a three-way with him and his boyfriend, who just happens to be your counterpart from another universe.)

A Little Less Conversation by ladyshadowdrake (Ults & 616) 

Maybe being thrown into an alternate universe was not so bad. Not only were there less planet-eating monsters to fight, but Antonio Stark encounters a Steve Rogers with a similar itch to scratch, who’s willing to engage in some mutual relief.

Not like that. by SilverInStars (Ults & Noir) 

Noir! Tony stumbles across Ults! Steve in a forest.

Two’s Company, Three’s a Crowd, Four’s a Party by cptxrogers (Ults, MCU, AA & 616)

How to satisfy the secret desires of a horny supersolider:
Ults Steve gets gangbaged by Tony from four different universes.

How To Keep Your Capwolf Happy by laireshi @laireshi

“How was I supposed to know it’d happen? The virus seemed to be completely out of your body. But don’t worry, Cap, you make a dashing werewolf.”
Steve growled.
“You’re not proving me wrong, darling.”

Fake It by laireshi

“Is it true you and Captain America are dating?” the journalist asked.
Tony gave her his most charming smile. “Captain America likes to keep his life private,” he said. “But he knew who I was when he kissed me.” Another fake, wide smile. “We’re very happy.”

Like Sands Through the Hourglass by BlossomsintheMist @blossomsinthemist

It’s a hard mission for the Ultimates.  Luckily, neither Steve nor Tony are as alone as they used to be.


Angst:

Fool’s Luck by msermesth @msermesth

Steve arrives on his doorstep exactly three hours and twenty-seven minutes after Tony finishes the last word of his eulogy.

A Uniform Velocity from the Cradle to the Grave by  Sineala @sineala

The machine found in the wake of the attempted Chitauri invasion opens a portal that could lead anywhere. Steve’s sure as hell not expecting it to lead a decade in the future, to a New York reeling from another alien attack. And he’s definitely not expecting the man he finds on the other side of it.

A Hundred Times, Once by FestiveFerret, SirSapling

The shrill tone of his SHIELD beeper pulls Steve out of sleep and into battle. He fights robots, he fights Tony’s shameless advances, he fights the exhaustion that threatens to take over him, drown him.  And then the next morning, he wakes and does it again. Exactly the same.
And again.
And again.
And again.

Stronger Together by Neverever

Steve has to fight on new battlegrounds to save Tony when Tony is terribly injured in a fight and it’s revealed that they’re secretly married.

Every Chance We’ll Have by magicasen

A mission gone south leaves a city block decimated and Iron Man hospitalized, but what makes top headlines is the fact that Captain America has a secret lover.

To the man himself, it’s a living nightmare. His husband is in a coma, his entire world is falling apart around him, and Steve has to to confront realities he never wanted to.


Smut:

Taking the Edge Off  by CapnShellhead  @capn-shellhead

Cap was a strange one. Every month, for three days, he would head off to some remote location in the woods. So, of course Tony decides to follow him.

Out of Touch by mitochondrials                

Tony is suffering the aftereffects of some AIM engineered breeding chemical. Steve, despite his embarrassment, firmly advocates helping.

Euperipatoides maxiphallus by Anonymous

Steve gets into a sticky situation. With bugs.

two bottle whiskey for the way by  enkiduu

Steve lets Tony fuck him, but it was only supposed to be the once. It was only supposed to be that much.

Come On Mess Me Up by cptxrogers

Being president isn’t easy, especially when you’ve got a civil war to deal with and your staff keeps sending you to PR events. Steve’s had just about enough of the office, the deferential staffers, and the stuffy shirts that Carol makes him wear.
What he really wants is for someone to come along and make a mess of him.

You Don’t Know What Thirst Is by FestiveFerret         

"I need…” Steve stumbled forward again. “Help me. Please.” He took one last step, and his legs gave out. He fell to his knees, chin tipped down, chest heaving. His whole body trembled.

Relax, Darling by cptxrogers

Being president isn’t easy, especially when you’ve got a civil war to deal with and your staff keeps sending you to PR events. Steve’s had just about enough of the office, the deferential staffers, and the stuffy shirts that Carol makes him wear.
What he really wants is for someone to come along and make a mess of him.

An Educational Experience (The Good Things Come To Those Who Wait Remix) by cptxrogers

Ults Tony has a nice day. aka Tony talks Steve through sucking his cock.


Multiverse:

Reflections by laireshi (Ults & 616)

“I am you,” Tony just said.
“You’re certainly pretty enough for it,” the other him said. He made a show of looking around. “Is Captain America here, as well?”

Ulterior Motives by Sineala (Ults & Planet Hulk)

Captured in combat and sold to Arcade, Steve is one of the few survivors of a long-forgotten domain of Battleworld. With Bucky and Devil Dinosaur at his side, Steve fights in the Killiseum by day – and his body is on offer for the richest of the Killiseum’s patrons by night. One evening, he’s given to a man by the name of Antonio Stark, who has a whole lot of feelings for someone who isn’t exactly him, and together they work out an understanding.

A Thousand Kisses Deep by laireshi (Ults & 616)

Steve doesn’t seem too happy when Steve Rogers of Marvel Ultimate gets transported into their universe. He seems even less happy when Tony and the new Steve get closer to each other.

hell is round the corner & hell is around the corner (remix) by CapnShellhead (Ults & MCU)

Steve stumbles across an unlikely sight in the kitchen.

Just for the Conversation by msermesth (Ults & 616) 

Tony’s fine. He’s back on the Avengers, Steve seems to have forgiven him, and he’s building Resilient to change the world.
Then why is he so jealous of Steve’s new boyfriend?
(Or: that awkward moment when you realize you are in love with your old best friend while having a three-way with him and his boyfriend, who just happens to be your counterpart from another universe.)

A Little Less Conversation by ladyshadowdrake (Ults & 616) 

Maybe being thrown into an alternate universe was not so bad. Not only were there less planet-eating monsters to fight, but Antonio Stark encounters a Steve Rogers with a similar itch to scratch, who’s willing to engage in some mutual relief.

Not like that. by SilverInStars (Ults & Noir) 

Noir! Tony stumbles across Ults! Steve in a forest.

Two’s Company, Three’s a Crowd, Four’s a Party by cptxrogers (Ults, MCU, AA & 616)

How to satisfy the secret desires of a horny supersolider:
Ults Steve gets gangbaged by Tony from four different universes.

blog.name: steverogersorbust
blog.title: superhero situation
blog.description: East coast| cis!female comics junkie who loves pizza and chris evans. wishing i was kate bishop pretty much like, always

summary: i keep looking at my tattoo like, 'remember when chris evans murmured, 'oh yeah of course,' in his soft gravelly voice when i...
caption:
i keep looking at my tattoo like, ‘remember when chris evans murmured, 'oh yeah of course,’ in his soft gravelly voice when i asked him to write this phrase as an homage to my favorite character on earth?’ and then my serotonin levels just skyrocket. also my dopamine levels. all the levels. all the everything. just at the memory of his eyelashes against his cheeks as he looked down, sincerely and deeply concentrating on scribbling a slightly incorrect version of an iconic line, which will forever live on my body, mistakes and all. 

i love him. i love how kind and genuine and funny and personable and gentle he is. i love steve rogers. i love how stubborn and strong and sad and good he tries to be. i love that chris doesn’t know captain america’s mantra any better than i do despite me loving the guy and him playing the guy, because neither of us caught that it was wrong when he wrote it, but somehow the genuine flaw makes it more real to me, makes it more special. because when i look at it, i remember that fictional people aren’t the only ones who get back up after getting beat down, again and again. that real people fight, too. that we should fight. because when backed against a wall, for the right reason, we all can–because we all could–do this all day.

anyway i love this fandom, i love this actor, i love this superhero. and i love this tattoo.

tags: but i mean disney could totally make it happen
JOIN THE MARVEL AND SOPHIA THE FIRST UNIVERSES!!
LET SOPHIA SUMMON THE HULK FROM HER AMULET!!!
summary: my experience with Sophia the First is only seeing it in my periphery when I’m at my friends’ houses and they have it in the...
body:
my experience with Sophia the First is only seeing it in my periphery when I’m at my friends’ houses and they have it in the background playing for their kids, but last night I had a freakin cute dream about it

In it Sophia needs to nail a wooden sign up over her booth for a school fair, but it’s too high up and she can’t reach it (she and her friends are extremely short) so she uses her amulet to summon a princess to help her, but the magic cloud passes and before her stands an armored, 6′3′’ man with long blonde hair… He is.. The god of thunder… Thor. 

Sophia said, “You’re not a princess, but you’re tall and have a hammer, could you help me with my sign?”

Thor, though confused about his new surrounding, rolled with it like a champ  and said, “Of course, your highness.” And proceeded to use Mjolnir to hammer in this little girl’s bake sale sign. Sophia gave Thor a cupcake, thanked him for his help, and the two parted ways friends…

blog.name: zorilita
blog.title: Zorilita - Mary Bellamy
blog.description: Hi! I'm a licensed illustrator and animation assistant. I currently work on the My Little Pony comic with IDW Publishing and Angry Viking Press on an unannounced project. I'm also a sketch card artist for several official sets including Adventure Time, Marvel, DC Comics, Ghostbusters and more. I've worked on over 150 books including children's picture books in London. I also self publish my own series Ah Heck!! and Faux Facts and have exhibited at San Diego Comic Con officially since 2009. This blog features a little bit of everything If only interested in art I suggest my other blog.

blog.title: Aesthetics and memes
blog.description: UK. She/them pronouns. Queer. 20+. I use tumblr as a means of escape/ relaxing and screaming into the void about comics.

summary: Honestly just a thought but the reason why I see queer ppl gravitating towards very obviously non-human stuff like Venom is bc...
body:
Honestly just a thought but the reason why I see queer ppl gravitating towards very obviously non-human stuff like Venom is bc they’re much more suitable for queer projection. Like you can assign whatever gender/ orientation to Venom because it breaks the bounds of the binary gender structure of a lot of our world (not all, but a lot of it), just by the simple fact that it isn’t human and thereby appeals to the ‘other’.

(Venom specifically appeals on a deeper level as well bc his character arc shows him being an outcast/ ‘loser’ on his planet since he doesn’t eat and kill his hosts, he sticks with one host who he keeps alive and is ostracised for this.)

After all that; I have to say that realistically Venom has no gender since they reproduce asexually and all Venom cares about is tater tots thanks for coming to my TedTalk.

blog.name: stan-ironman
blog.title: tony stark? wig.
blog.description:
| im an orphan now | side blog | 17 | bi/aro |
i just really love him

summary:
Stephen: Tony, please, just go to sleep. 
Tony, with shaky hands clutching his nth cup of coffee: I am above sleep. Slumber...
body:
Stephen: Tony, please, just go to sleep.

Tony, with shaky hands clutching his nth cup of coffee: I am above sleep. Slumber cannot tether down my insatiable need to create.

Stephen: Well, I can. So go the fuck to sleep before I tie you down on the bed.

reblog.comment:

Stephen: Tony, please, just go to sleep.

Tony, with shaky hands clutching his nth cup of coffee: I am above sleep. Slumber cannot tether down my insatiable need to create.

Stephen: Well, I can. So go the fuck to sleep before I tie you down on the bed.

summary: Good Evening, Ma’am… (Eddie and Venom) - 2018 It’s ok, everything is perfectly normal…
